SVGFEPointLightElement.summary: The SVGFEPointLightElement interface corresponds to the fePointLight element.

SVGFEPointLightElementX.summary: The x read-only property of the interface describes the horizontal coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("x")}} attribute of the fePointLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a point light effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.

SVGFEPointLightElementZ.summary: The z read-only property of the interface describes the z-axis value of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a . A positive Z-axis comes out towards the person viewing the content.

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("z")}} attribute of the fePointLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a point light effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.

SVGFEPointLightElementY.summary: The y read-only property of the interface describes the vertical coordinate of the position of an SVG filter primitive as a .

remarks.para: It reflects the {{SVGAttr("y")}} attribute of the fePointLight element, which can be used to define the light source in a point light effect. The attribute is a <number>. The default value is 0.
